text: Shane Andre Mosley (born September 7, 1971) is a retired American professional boxer from Pomona, California. Mosley has held world titles in three weight divisions. He held the IBF Lightweight Championship, WBC & WBA (Super) Welterweight Championships and WBC, WBA (Super) & The Ring Light Middleweight Championships. == References == * official website * Sugar Shane Mosley record Category:American boxers Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:Sportspeople from Pomona, California
title: Shane Mosley
